data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Menu,
        Spacer,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Box palette="negative" padding="medium">
    <Menu.Container>
        <Menu.Heading>FEEDBACK</Menu.Heading>

        <Menu.Section>
            <Menu.Button active>
                Dot
                <Spacer />
                <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
            </Menu.Button>

            <Menu.Button>
                Spinner
                <Spacer />
                <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
            </Menu.Button>
        </Menu.Section>

        <Menu.Heading>OVERLAYS</Menu.Heading>

        <Menu.Section>
            <Menu.Button>
                Overlay
                <Spacer />
                <Text is="span">ICON</Text>
            </Menu.Button>
        </Menu.Section>
    </Menu.Container>
</Box>
data.title: Menu Section
